    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>8063</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Picasso and Ceramics</string>
            <string language="es">Picasso y la cerámica</string>
            <string language="ga">Picasso agus Ceirmeacha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Picasso und Keramik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Picasso et céramique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Picasso e ceramics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Picasso e ceramica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πικάσο και κεραμική</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Children will learn about Picasso and his ceramics.</string>
            <string language="es">Los niños conocerán a Picasso y sus trabajos de cerámica.</string>
            <string language="ga">Foghlaimeoidh leanaí faoi Picasso agus a ceirmeacha.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Visual Arts</string>
            <string language="es">Artes visuales</string>
            <string language="ga">Amharcealaíona</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder erlernen über Picasso und seine Keramik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les enfants se renseigneront sur Picasso et sa 
céramique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças aprenderão sobre Picasso e seu 
ceramics.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini impareranno circa Picasso e la sua 
ceramica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά θα μάθουν για τον Πικάσο και την κεραμική 
του.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtkünste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts Visuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
